posts.title: Getting Started with Next.js Development
posts.description: Learn the basics of Next.js and how to create your first application with this powerful React framework. MAIN
posts.content: Next.js is a powerful framework for building React applications that provides features like server-side rendering and static site generation out of the box...

posts.title: Mastering SCSS for Modern Web Design
posts.description: Deep dive into SCSS features that will help you write better and more maintainable CSS.
posts.content: SCSS is a powerful CSS preprocessor that enables you to use variables, nested rules, mixins, and more...
